name: Bone Shaker - Bone Shaker - Maul
additionalNotes: Boneshaker Cigars are definitely not for the squeamish, however, they most certainly will offer your full-bodied cigar shoppers an undeniably bold and delicious smoke that won’t put a dent in their wallets. Sold here at Santa Clara for the best cigar wholesale prices on the web, these flawlessly rolled handmade premium cigars feature a dark and savory Connecticut Broadleaf maduro wrapper crowning a hearty blend of powerful Nicaraguan ligero long filler tobaccos. The finished product is oozing with heady flavors of earth, cinnamon, black pepper, and espresso, all enhanced with creamy smooth finish.
